verses.verse: Now in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> which is the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H143>Adar,<s%> on the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H4428>month,<s%> when the king's <S%H1697>commandment<s%> and his <S%H1881>decree<s%> drew <S%H5060>near<s%> to be put in <S%H6213>execution,<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H341>enemies<s%> of the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H7663>hoped<s%> to <S%H7980>conquer<s%> <S%H2015>them,<s%> (but it was turned out the opposite <S%H3064>happened,<s%> that the Jews <S%H7980>conquered<s%> those who hated <S%H8130>them<s%>),

the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%> throughout all the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> of the <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> to <S%H7971>lay<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> on those who <S%H1245>wanted<s%> to <S%H7451>harm<s%> <S%H376>them.<s%> No one could <S%H5975>withstand<s%> <S%H6440>them,<s%> because the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of them had <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on all the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

All the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces,<s%> the <S%H323>satraps,<s%> the <S%H6346>governors,<s%> and <S%H6213>those<s%> who did the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s business <S%H5375>helped<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> because the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> had fallen on <S%H5307>them.<s%>

For <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> was <S%H1419>great<s%> in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and his <S%H8089>fame<s%> went <S%H1980>out<s%> throughout all the <S%H4082>provinces;<s%> for the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H1980>grew<s%> greater and <S%H1419>greater.<s%>

The <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> all their <S%H341>enemies<s%> with the <S%H4347>stroke<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and with <S%H2027>slaughter<s%> and <S%H12>destruction,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> what they <S%H7522>wanted<s%> to those who hated <S%H8130>them.<s%>
In the <S%H1002>citadel<s%> of <S%H7800>Susa,<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H2026>killed<s%> and <S%H6>destroyed<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>
They <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H6577>Parshandatha,<s%> <S%H1813>Dalphon,<s%> <S%H630>Aspatha,<s%>
<S%H6334>Poratha,<s%> <S%H118>Adalia,<s%> <S%H743>Aridatha,<s%>
<S%H6534>Parmashta,<s%> <S%H747>Arisai,<s%> <S%H742>Aridai,<s%> and <S%H2055>Vaizatha,<s%>

the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2001>Haman<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4099>Hammedatha,<s%> the <S%H3064>Jew<s%>'s <S%H6887>enemy,<s%> but they <S%H7971>didn't<s%> lay their <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H961>plunder.<s%>

On that <S%H3117>day,<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of those who were <S%H2026>slain<s%> in the <S%H1002>citadel<s%> of <S%H7800>Susa<s%> was <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen,<s%> "The <S%H3064>Jews<s%> have <S%H2026>slain<s%> and <S%H6>destroyed<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> in the <S%H1002>citadel<s%> of <S%H7800>Susa,<s%> including the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2001>Haman;<s%> what then have they <S%H6213>done<s%> in the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4082>provinces!<s%> Now what is your <S%H7596>petition?<s%> It shall be <S%H5414>granted<s%> <S%H5750>you.<s%> What is your further <S%H1246>request?<s%> It shall be <S%H6213>done.<s%>"

Then <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "If it <S%H2896>pleases<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> let it be <S%H5414>granted<s%> to the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who are in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> also according to this <S%H3117>day<s%>'s <S%H1881>decree,<s%> and let <S%H2001>Haman<s%>'s <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> be <S%H8518>hanged<s%> on the <S%H6086>gallows.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> this to be <S%H6213>done.<s%> A <S%H559>decree<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> out in <S%H7800>Shushan;<s%> and they <S%H8518>hanged<s%> <S%H2001>Haman<s%>'s <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

The <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who were in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> also of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H143>Adar,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> in <S%H7800>Shushan;<s%> but they <S%H7971>didn't<s%> lay their <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H961>spoil.<s%>

The <S%H7605>other<s%> <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who were in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4082>provinces<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6950>together,<s%> <S%H5975>defended<s%> their <S%H5315>lives,<s%> had <S%H5118>rest<s%> from their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> of those who <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H7971>them;<s%> but they didn't lay their <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H961>plunder.<s%>

This was done on the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H143>Adar;<s%> and on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> day of that month they <S%H5118>rested<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> it a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4960>feasting<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness.<s%>

But the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who were in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> assembled <S%H6950>together<s%> on the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> and on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> days of the <S%H2568>month;<s%> and on the fifteenth day of that <S%H5118>month,<s%> they rested, and <S%H6213>made<s%> it a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4960>feasting<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> of the <S%H6521>villages,<s%> who live in the <S%H6519>unwalled<s%> <S%H5892>towns,<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H143>Adar<s%> a day of <S%H8057>gladness<s%> and <S%H4960>feasting,<s%> a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4916>sending<s%> <S%H4490>presents<s%> of food to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7453>another.<s%>

<S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> these <S%H1697>things,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> to all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who were in all the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> both <S%H7138>near<s%> and <S%H7350>far,<s%>
to <S%H6965>enjoin<s%> them that they should <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> and fifteenth <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H143>Adar<s%> <S%H8141>yearly,<s%>

as the <S%H3117>days<s%> in which the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> had <S%H5117>rest<s%> from their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and the <S%H2320>month<s%> which was <S%H2015>turned<s%> to them from <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> to <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> and from <S%H60>mourning<s%> into a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> that they should <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H4960>feasting<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> and of <S%H4916>sending<s%> <S%H4490>presents<s%> of food to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7453>another,<s%> and <S%H4979>gifts<s%> to the <S%H34>needy.<s%>
The <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H6901>accepted<s%> the <S%H6213>custom<s%> that they had <S%H2490>begun,<s%> as <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> had written to <S%H3789>them;<s%>

because <S%H2001>Haman<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4099>Hammedatha,<s%> the <S%H91>Agagite,<s%> the <S%H6887>enemy<s%> of all the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> had <S%H2803>plotted<s%> against the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> to <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H5307>them,<s%> and had cast <S%H6332>"Pur,<s%>" that is the <S%H1486>lot,<s%> to <S%H2000>consume<s%> <S%H6>them,<s%> and to destroy them;

but when this <S%H935>became<s%> known <S%H6440>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> he <S%H559>commanded<s%> by <S%H5612>letters<s%> that his <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H4284>device,<s%> which he had <S%H2803>devised<s%> against the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> should <S%H7725>return<s%> on his own <S%H7218>head,<s%> and that he and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> should be <S%H8518>hanged<s%> on the <S%H6086>gallows.<s%>

Therefore they <S%H7121>called<s%> these <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H6332>"Purim,<s%>" from the <S%H8034>word<s%> <S%H6332>"Pur.<s%>" Therefore because of all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H107>letter,<s%> and of that which they had <S%H7200>seen<s%> concerning this <S%H3602>matter,<s%> and that which had come to <S%H5060>them,<s%>

the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H6965>established,<s%> and <S%H6901>imposed<s%> on <S%H2233>themselves,<s%> and on their descendants, and on all those who <S%H3867>joined<s%> themselves to <S%H5674>them,<s%> so that it should not fail, that they would <S%H6213>keep<s%> these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> according to what was <S%H3791>written,<s%> and according to its appointed <S%H2165>time,<s%> every <S%H8141>year;<s%>

and that these <S%H3117>days<s%> should be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> and <S%H6213>kept<s%> <S%H1755>throughout<s%> every <S%H1755>generation,<s%> every <S%H4940>family,<s%> every <S%H4082>province,<s%> and every <S%H5892>city;<s%> and that these <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6332>Purim<s%> should not <S%H5674>fail<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> nor their <S%H2143>memory<s%> <S%H5486>perish<s%> from their <S%H2233>seed.<s%>

Then <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H32>Abihail,<s%> and <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> the <S%H3064>Jew,<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> with all <S%H8633>authority<s%> to <S%H6965>confirm<s%> this <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H107>letter<s%> of <S%H6332>Purim.<s%>

He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> to all the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> to the <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4082>provinces<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> with <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H571>truth,<s%>

to <S%H6965>confirm<s%> these <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6332>Purim<s%> in their appointed <S%H2165>times,<s%> as <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> the <S%H3064>Jew<s%> and <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%> had <S%H6965>decreed,<s%> and as they had <S%H6965>imposed<s%> upon <S%H5315>themselves<s%> and their <S%H2233>descendants,<s%> in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of the <S%H6685>fastings<s%> and their <S%H2201>cry.<s%>
The <S%H3982>commandment<s%> of <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H6965>confirmed<s%> these <S%H1697>matters<s%> of <S%H6332>Purim;<s%> and it was <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book.<s%>
